name: Guitar Masterclass
shortDescription: Learn to play the guitar like a pro!
description: In this masterclass, students will learn various guitar techniques, chords, scales, and how to play their favorite songs. Whether you're a beginner or have some experience, this class will take your guitar skills to the next level.

name: Vocal Training
description: This vocal training class is designed to help students develop their singing voice, improve pitch, control, and breath support. Through a combination of vocal exercises and popular songs, students will gain confidence in their singing abilities.

name: Saxophone Instructor
shortDescription: Get groovy with the bass guitar!
description: This class is perfect for beginners who want to learn the basics of playing the bass guitar. Students will learn about the instrument, proper technique, and how to create groovy basslines. No prior experience is required.

name: Piano Classes
shortDescription: Master the keyboard like a pro!
description: This class is perfect for beginners and intermediate students who want to learn how to play the keyboard. Students will be introduced to basic music theory, finger exercises, and popular melodies. By the end of the course, you'll be playing your favorite tunes on the keyboard.

name: Violin Classes
description: In this workshop, students will learn the art of songwriting, including melody, lyrics, and song structure. Through various exercises and collaborative projects, you'll develop your own unique musical style and create original songs.

name: Winds Guitar Fundamentals
shortDescription: Get groovy with the bass guitar!
description: This class is perfect for beginners who want to learn the basics of playing the bass guitar. Students will learn about the instrument, proper technique, and how to create groovy basslines. No prior experience is required.

name: Guitar Fundamentals
shortDescription: Get groovy with the bass guitar!
description: This class is perfect for beginners who want to learn the basics of playing the bass guitar. Students will learn about the instrument, proper technique, and how to create groovy basslines. No prior experience is required.

name: Drumming Workshop
description: In this drumming workshop, students will learn basic drumming techniques, coordination exercises, and rhythm patterns. No prior experience is required, and drums will be provided. Get ready to unleash your inner drummer!
